title: Model Railways - Right Track 3 - Painting
description:
Right Track 3 - Painting, Lining and Finishing [H265, Random002] - 3Hrs





Since these DVDs are not available anymore, remember there are others like you who would like this material so PLEASE SEED ;-)




TTony Wright and professional painter Ian Rathbone

show the methods they use for putting those all-important finishing touches to locomotives and rolling stock in both

0 and 00 gauges.

Tony covers re-branding, re-numbering and weathering locos from Hornby and Bachman whilst Ian shows the methods

he uses for lining, spray-painting, and weathering a selection

of locomotives and coaches.

The programme has over 20 sections and includes:

 Re-naming and numbering Ready to Run locomotives,

 Lining using a bow-pen and fine brush work,

 Weathering with brush, spray and pastels,

 Brush painting coaches and locomotives,

 Making transfers for lining,

 Spray painting locomotives

 and applying transfers.

Contents of the DVD

The first section (1 Hour 35 minutes) is presented by Tony Wright

 Re-branding Locomotives
 Painting a Coach Roof
 Applying Numbers
 Transfer Lining
 Painting with Aerosols
 Brush-painting Locomotives
 Brush Weathering
 Glazing 

The second section (1 Hr 40 Minutes) is presented by professional model painter Ian Rathbone.

 Preparation
 Airbrushes and Brushes
 Spraying Aerosol Primer
 Etching Primer
 Cleaning the Airbrush
 Spraying the Body Colour
 Airbrush Weathering
 Lining BR, LMS, GWR and BR Locomotives
 Lining a Coach Side
 Making Transfers
 Varnishing 


Important: Resolution = 768 x 576. However, I have encoded these from 8GB to a reasonable uploading size, so there will be the odd loss of definition here and there.
I used the H265 format, so if you have difficulty playing this file I suggest you download a media player like VLC
